title: Humanist sans, l with a tail and a awkward g
content:
Please help me identify this font.

Thanks.

comments.content:
[Delicious](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122040045/http:/www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/delicious.html)! It’s your lucky day: it’s free! :P Although he would appreciate a small donation, of course.

ruD
That’s cheating, Jos. No IDing your own typefaces. :P
I’m so bad at ID-ing that I just couldn’t resist this one :-)
